item.title: Validation with Zod
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Zod is the TypeScript-first schema validation library with static type inference. It’s functional approach to data validation is parse-dont-validate-in-typescript which parses the data in order to validate and catch errors.
